## QNCameraVideoTrack.previewMirrorFrontFacing() method

前置摄像头预览是否开启镜像

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  previewMirrorFrontFacing | boolean | 是否开启镜像 |

## Remarks
